title: Pigtails and Froglegs: A Family Cookbook from Neiman Marcus
description: This is one cookbook the kids will bring to mom again and again. Here are 280 kid-raved recipes and menu ideas generously spiced with quotations from kids with their mouths full and a zooful of zany drawings from Chuck Jones, the animator responsible for the Road Runner and Bugs Bunny.
author: Marcus Neiman
